title: Quest Rewards
body: So recently I got banned for the first time for hate speech (which I deserved).  I know I lose access to free rewards until I improve, but does that mean I don't get rewards from quest? If so, then does that mean when I complete a quest all my rewards are forfeited?

replies.body: You'll still get all of the rewards from those missions even if you're hextech loot restricted from punishments I'm pretty sure.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vFlkFoMP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-13T21:47:53.324+0000)
>
> You'll still get all of the rewards from those missions even if you're hextech loot restricted from punishments I'm pretty sure.

ah, okay. Thank you!
